backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, daily orders, karigar mappings, and assignments with authorization checks and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration controlling caching rules for index.html and other frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading SheetJS and the app’s root script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component with sidebar navigation and tabs for Order List, Daily Orders, and Karigar Mapping.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory.
Exports all orders for a selected factory as an HTML/PDF file.
Groups factory orders by karigar, supports filtering and per-karigar PDF export.
Sidebar listing factories with counts and allowing factory selection.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Table listing orders with selection, generic name lookup, and assignment display.
Search and sort controls for filtering and ordering the orders list.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main page for viewing, uploading, filtering, sorting, and saving daily orders with Excel parsing and diagnostics.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: Robust Excel/CSV parser that auto-detects headers, normalizes values, and outputs parsed orders with warnings.
Parses Excel or PDF karigar mapping files, detects column headers, and extracts design-to-karigar entries per sheet.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/expor: Exports parsed daily orders to an Excel file, optionally including karigar and generic name columns.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Provides search and sorting logic for filtering parsed orders by text and design.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML file grouping orders by karigar with design and generic name lookup, then triggers download.
Creates an HTML export of all orders for a single karigar, including generic names, sorted by design.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ge: Computes deterministic sheet read order, prioritizing sheets 1, 3, and 2 before others alphabetically.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/ka: Encodes mapping data to a blob and decodes it back, recomputing normalized design keys for compatibility.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/Ka: UI workflow for uploading, validating, parsing, summarizing, and saving karigar mapping workbooks.
frontend/src/features/karigar-mapping/us: Decodes a mapping blob and returns a summary with ordered sheet names and total entry count.
frontend/src/features/order-list/compone: Renders grouped orders by karigar with selection checkboxes and supports exporting a karigar’s orders to Excel.
Shows a table of enriched orders with selection controls for generic use within order views.
frontend/src/features/order-list/OrderLi: Displays daily orders, enriches them with karigar mapping, groups by karigar, and shows diagnostics and selection state.
frontend/src/features/order-list/useKari: Decodes the mapping blob into a normalized lookup map with priority sheet ordering and exposes mapping metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to provide simplified readiness and loading status for components.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating daily orders and karigar assignments, including logic for syncing and reassigning orders.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration placeholder for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Declares global TypeScript types for XLSX usage on the window object.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Provides helpers to read and format the build timestamp for display or programmatic use.
frontend/src/utils/textNormalize.ts: Implements text normalization utilities for cleaning Excel/CSV data, matching headers, and canonicalizing design codes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps internal errors to user-friendly messages with optional retry text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state for fixing karigar mapping by parsing mapping sheets from any sheet name and applying consistent design‑code normalization. Lists architectural notes, known issues, and existing/new feature requests related to Excel parsing and matching.
